query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflows (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  artistId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'draft') DEFAULT 'draft' NOT NULL,
  definition JSON NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('fan_engagement', 'release_automation', 'revenue_tracking', 'marketing', 'collaboration', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  isTemplate BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  templateSourceId INT,
  version INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  totalRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  successfulRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failedRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lastRunAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (artistId) REFERENCES artist_profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX artist_id_idx (artistId),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX category_idx (category)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:

  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  templateSourceId INT,
  version INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  totalRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  successfulRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failedRuns INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lastRunAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (artistId) REFERENCES artist_profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX artist_id_idx (artistId),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX category_idx (category)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
